name: Unown O
author: Daisuke Ito
flavor_text: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.

poke_power.name: ONE
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown O, Unown N, and Unown E on your Bench and you have 1 card left in your hand, you may draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
